home.checkInDescription: Check in with yourself ‚Äî it's the first step to self-care! Do it everyday.

checkInInfo.title: Why daily check-in matters?
checkInInfo.content:
Daily check-in is a simple yet powerful tool for improving your mental health. Here's why it's important:

‚Ä¢ Self-awareness: Regular emotional check-ins help you better understand your feelings and reactions

‚Ä¢ Early detection: Allows you to notice mood changes before they become serious problems

‚Ä¢ Care habit: Forms a beneficial habit of paying attention to your psychological state

‚Ä¢ Progress tracking: Helps track changes in your emotional state over time

‚Ä¢ Motivation: Understanding your emotions is the first step to managing them and improving your quality of life

Just a few minutes a day can significantly impact your overall well-being.

about.title: About Menhausen
about.description:
Menhausen is your personal mental health companion, created specifically for Telegram.

Our app helps you track your emotional state, develop healthy habits, and support your psychological well-being through daily check-ins and mindful exercises.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Daily mood tracking and emotional state monitoring
‚Ä¢ Personalized mental health exercises
‚Ä¢ Progress tracking with levels and achievements
‚Ä¢ Complete privacy ‚Äî your data stays yours
‚Ä¢ Telegram Mini Apps integration

Menhausen uses scientifically proven methods from cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT), acceptance and commitment therapy (ACT), and positive psychology to help you cope with anxiety, stress, and other emotional challenges.

The app is developed by a team of mental health and technology specialists who believe that psychological well-being care should be accessible, convenient, and effective for everyone.

Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è for the Telegram community.

about.disclaimer: Menhausen is designed to support your mental wellness journey, but it is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. If you're experiencing serious mental health concerns, please consult with qualified healthcare professionals.
about.emergency: For emergencies, please contact your local emergency services or mental health crisis hotline.

descriptions: Works directly in Telegram. No accounts, no email required
AES-256, Web3 technology. Your data is protected at banking-grade level
In your pocket, in Telegram. Help available 24/7, when you need it
CBT, ACT, MBCT, positive psychology ‚Äî scientifically proven methods. No fluff. Straight, honest, to the point. Man to man.
